name: Swing
desc: The most basic of attacks. No special features, this is a threat to only the weakest of foes

name: Slice
desc: Twisting your weapon mid-strike creates a jagged wound, bleeding your foe.

name: Fireball
desc: Baby's First Spell. Does minor damage, but sets target on fire.

name: Holy Beam
desc: Invoking awesome powers, the priesthood calls down the divine judgement of the Gods. Such devotion is rewarded, as you're healed for a small amount.

name: Curse
desc: Calling upon the... less than savory gods, you invoke eldritch energies upon a foe.

name: Putrid Curse
desc: The warlocks would tell you that the natural state of everything is death. They'd also tell you that they're merely speeding up the process

name: Vampiric bite
desc: Somehow, you use your weapon in such a way that it steals life. Not sure how that works.

name: Uppercut
desc: Hit your foe with a brutal uppercut, stunning them

name: Taunt
desc: The mages would have you know that sometimes words are more powerful than simple weapons. Stun your enemy, but deal no damage

name: Immolate
desc: Set your foe alight, dealing massive degen damage

name: Chill
desc: Invoking the north winds, you chill the very air around a foe, dealing damage.

name: Frostbite
desc: You call forth the very worst of the mountain winds, freezing and degening your foe.

name: Divine Blessing
desc: The power of the Gods restores you.
